title: My Pet Beast is Super Awesome - Novel Updates
tags: Beast Companions   Caring Protagonist   Gods   Male Protagonist   Mutated Creatures   Pets   System Administrator   Weak to Strong
author: Watering Horse while Gazing at Qinchuan
description:
“Look at you, you were this teeny-weeny when you were little.” 

Using both hands, Shao Zifeng gestures how small his pet beast used to be. He then raises his head and looks at the gigantic being in front of him. 

“Just how did you grow into this ferocious form?” 

>
